metadata.title: CVE-2015-8793 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in program/include/rcmail.php inRoundcube before 1.0.6 and 1.1.x before 1.1.2 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via the _mbox parameter in a mail taskto the default URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2011-2937.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8793` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1').
